word:
Everyone who has a knowledge of the truth has a work to do to come into sympathy with Christ. "Ye are laborers together with God." The salvation of the soul is above every other interest; how much higher than every other enterprise is measured by the cross of Calvary. Christ's servants will work the works of Christ.--Manuscript 10, 1892, pp. 3,4. 

White Estate Washington, D. C. March 1, 1979
